statements: SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, temperature_celsius FROM medications ORDER BY temperature_celsius DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE temperature_celsius > 25;
SELECT medication_name FROM medications WHERE temperature_celsius < 10 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE storage_conditions->>'humidity' = 'low';
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT id, medication_name, temperature_celsius FROM medications WHERE temperature_celsius > 20;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE storage_conditions->>'humidity' = 'low';
SELECT medication_name, temperature_celsius FROM medications WHERE temperature_celsius BETWEEN 15 AND 25 ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT id, medication_name, storage_conditions FROM medications WHERE storage_conditions->>'temperature' = 'room temperature';
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, storage_temperature FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, storage_temperature FROM medications WHERE storage_temperature < 20;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, storage_conditions FROM medications WHERE storage_conditions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT medication_name, storage_temperature FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, storage_conditions FROM medications WHERE storage_temperature < 25;
SELECT medication_name, storage_temperature, log_timestamp FROM medications JOIN temperature_logs ON medications.medication_id = temperature_logs.medication_id;
SELECT medication_name, AVG(temperature_reading) AS average_temperature FROM medications JOIN temperature_logs ON medications.medication_id = temperature_logs.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT medication_name, storage_temperature FROM medications ORDER BY storage_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, temperature FROM medications WHERE storage_condition='Dry';
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_time FROM logs ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT medication_name, temperature FROM medications WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT r.requirement, r.description FROM regulations r;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE storage_condition = 'Cool' ORDER BY medication_id DESC;
SELECT medication_name, temperature FROM medications WHERE medication_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_time FROM logs WHERE event_type LIKE 'Admin%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT medication_name, storage_condition FROM medications AS m JOIN logs AS l ON m.medication_id = l.medication_id WHERE event_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT regulation_id, requirement, description FROM regulations ORDER BY requirement;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, temperature_storage FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature_celsius > 25;
SELECT medication_name FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;

SELECT medications.medication_name, storage_conditions.condition_name FROM medications_conditions JOIN medications ON medications_conditions.medication_id = medications.medication_id JOIN storage_conditions ON medications_conditions.condition_id = storage_conditions.condition_id;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, temperature_storage FROM medications WHERE temperature_storage IS NOT NULL;
SELECT medication_name, temperature_storage, storage_condition FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT m.medication_name, sc.condition_name FROM medications m JOIN medications_conditions mc ON m.medication_id = mc.medication_id JOIN storage_conditions sc ON mc.condition_id = sc.condition_id;

SELECT m.medication_name, tl.logged_date, tl.temperature_celsius FROM medications m JOIN temperature_logs tl ON m.medication_id = tl.medication_id WHERE m.medication_id = 1 ORDER BY tl.logged_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, temperature_recorded FROM medications WHERE temperature_recorded > 25;
SELECT storage_conditions.condition_name, medications.medication_name FROM medications JOIN storage_conditions ON medications.storage_conditions = storage_conditions.condition_id;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT medications.medication_name, regulatory_guidelines.guideline_description FROM medications JOIN compliance_records ON medications.id = compliance_records.medication_id JOIN regulatory_guidelines ON compliance_records.guideline_id = regulatory_guidelines.guideline_id WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE temperature_recorded > 25 ORDER BY medication_name DESC;

SELECT medication_name, temperature_recorded, storage_conditions FROM medications JOIN temperature_logs ON medications.id = temperature_logs.medication_id WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY medication_name;

SELECT medication_name, temperature, timestamp FROM medications JOIN temperature_logs ON medications.id = temperature_logs.medication_id WHERE temperature < 20 AND storage_conditions = 'Cool' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT medications.medication_name, regulatory_guidelines.guideline_description FROM medications JOIN compliance_records ON medications.id = compliance_records.medication_id JOIN regulatory_guidelines ON compliance_records.guideline_id = regulatory_guidelines.guideline_id WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY medications.medication_name;

SELECT storage_conditions.condition_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM medications JOIN storage_conditions ON medications.storage_conditions = storage_conditions.condition_name GROUP BY storage_conditions.condition_name HAVING count > 3 ORDER BY count DESC;
